item.title: New bi-directional export for TI in Microsoft Sentinel and strategic Cyware partnership
item.description: Empowering collective defense through seamless threat intel sharing We’re excited to announce a key milestone in advancing the threat intelligence platform within Microsoft Sentinel: You can now export threat intelligence to trusted destinations with ease. This milestone enables bi-directional sharing, allowing security teams not only to ingest intelligence but also to contribute back to partners, Information Sharing and Analysis Centers (ISACs), and multi-tenant environments—strengthening collective defense across the ecosystem. Together with this release, we’re also excited to announce a str...
